'''Ancient Key''' is a Quest Item obtained in [[Dar al-Shifa]] from where [[Razak]] used to be before rescuing him in the [[Archon Quest]] ''[[Cry From the Eleazar Hospital]]''.

It is a required item in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Eleazar Hospital Notes]]''.

This item can only be discovered after completing ''[[Secret of the Scorching Desert]]''.
